name: Ponkle
description:
Ponkle is a simple 2D jump action game that climbs up the block.
Use items for avoiding obstacles and aim at the top.
A new stage is waiting for you one after another.
There is no end to the stage that becomes difficult gradually.
Please challenge by all means how far you can proceed.

・Simple operation with jump only
Player can only operate by jump with mouse click.
You can jump once on the block and once in the air.
Movement in the horizontal direction is done automatically, but the speed will change with the effect of items.

・Items
Various items are placed, such as speedup, jump-up, invincibility, etc.
You can proceed with the game advantageously by getting it.

・Obstacles
Obstacles are randomly placed in the stage.
Since If you touch it you will make a mistake, you need to avoid it by jumping or using items.

・Randomly generated stage
Blocks, items, obstacles are all randomly placed.
Each time you play it is different, so you can play with fresh feelings.
As you progress through the stage, it will become a difficult placement little by little.
